<div class="header">
  <h1>Monash Proteomics and Metabolomics Facility</h1>
  <p></p>
</div>

<div class="body-text">
</p>
<p>Equipped with the latest mass spectrometric instrumentation, the
<strong>Monash Proteomics &amp; Metabolomics Facility (MPMF)</strong>
combines cutting-edge technology with state-of-the-art methodology to
provide the best possible results and expertise to customers and
collaborators.</p>
<p>Mass spectrometry is one of the leading technologies to
comprehensively identify and globally quantify proteins and other
biomolecules in virtually every biological sample and environment.</p>
<p>Due to its unparalleled sensitivity and accuracy, mass spectrometry
is the method of choice for a plethora of applications ranging from
biomarker discoveries to absolute quantifications of low abundant
peptide species.</p>
<blockquote>
<p><a href="https://www.monash.edu/researchinfrastructure/mpmf">More on
MPMF</a></p>
</blockquote>
</div>
